data.text:
+ Orthodox Christian Theological Seminaries, Institutes, Academies, Colleges, and Universities Worldwide

(OCEI- Orthodox Christian Educational Institutions)

Center for Orthodox Studies

OCEI is a comprehensive list of Orthodox Christian institutions of higher education. The list of institutes is arranged according to the respective countries. The list consists of theological seminaries, learning institutions, academics, universities, institutes of iconographic art, etc. Areas related to Byzantine studies, Coptology, Armenian studies, eastern Christian studies, Hellenic Studies are also included.

All are welcome to add more educational resources to the list below. Please email the name of the institution, the country situated and weblink to ocpsociety.org@gmail.com.

OCEI is a project under the Center for Orthodox Studies (COS), which is a learning entity under the Dept. of Church Research & Studies of Orthodoxy Cognate PAGE – Pan-Orthodox Society.
